A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi was quite possibly the worst Star Wars film ever created.  It barely relates to episode 7\, the plot holes are unbearable\, and they ruined both Luke and Leia.  I left the theater in utter shock and still cannot believe this is an actual Star Wars movie.  The only reason it gets one star is because it was well shot and the music is amazing.  The story and characters\, however\, are terrible.
